basicInfo.name: Hokin
basicInfo.flavor: Hokin's significant contribution to expanding the goblin forces has earned him the great title of goblin chief.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Throw Weapon
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 39% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Swift Rider
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 33% Physical Damage Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Goblin Spirit
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost when HP is 50% or lower. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Attack Boost to 31%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story:
Hokin is the leader of a group of goblins that regularly raids the Mystic Woods.
For his success in expanding the goblin dominion, the elders granted him the revered title of Goblin Lord.
When the protector of the Mystic Woods, Rudy, became preoccupied with incidents involving his friend and rival, Kris, Hokin took the opportunity to lead raid after raid into the Mystic Woods.
However, his excessive pillaging eventually led to his defeat at the hands of Evan.
Hokin was only allowed to go on a rampage through the Mystic Woods thanks to Karon's non-intervention.
Karon's astrology predicted that the threat posed by Hokin would cause the forest friends to band together under Pepe and create lasting peace even after the threat had passed.

basicInfo.name: Hokin
basicInfo.flavor: As the captain of the goblins, Hokin helped his goblin chief father conquer the Wind Forest.
